comments:
Hello

When running a plugin in a self hosted Run-time Workbench, it seems that the 
classpath is missing the external jars used for building the plugin. Notice 
that I had to modify the build.xml of the plugin for including the external jar 
in the <javac> task and specified the build.xml as a custom build.


0/ Eclipse version
Eclipse Platform

Version: Not Specified
Build id: 200311030802


1/ Here is the failing error:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/javacc/parser/Main
	at com.pac.jdt.javacc.core.builder.JavaCCBuilder.compileFile
(JavaCCBuilder.java:140)
	at com.pac.jdt.javacc.ui.actions.CompileAction$Operation.execute
(CompileAction.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1595)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:101)




2/ The running command
java.version=1.4.1_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

F:\runtime-workspace -debug

win32 -arch x86 -nl fr_FR -configuration 
file:F:/Java/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/F__runtime-
workspace/platform.cfg -install file:D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/

4/ The modified build.xml file with javacc.jar added as external jar at line 50 
in the <javac> element.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project name="com.pac.jdt.javacc.core" default="build.jars" basedir=".">

	<property name="bootclasspath" value=""/>
	<property name="ws" value="win32"/>
	<property name="os" value="win32"/>
	<property name="arch" value="x86"/>
	<property name="javacFailOnError" value="false"/>
	<property name="javacDebugInfo" value="on"/>
	<property name="javacVerbose" value="true"/>

	<target name="init" depends="properties">
		<property name="plugin" value="com.pac.jdt.javacc.core"/>
		<property name="version.suffix" value="_1.1.0"/>
		<property name="full.name" value="${plugin}${version.suffix}"/>
		<property name="temp.folder" value="${basedir}/temp.folder"/>
		<property name="plugin.destination" value="${basedir}"/>
		<property name="build.result.folder" value="${basedir}"/>
	</target>

	<target name="properties" if="eclipse.running">
		<property name="build.compiler" 
value="org.eclipse.jdt.core.JDTCompilerAdapter"/>
	</target>

	<target name="build.update.jar" depends="init" description="Build the 
plug-in: com.pac.jdt.javacc.core for an update site.">
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}"/>
		<mkdir dir="${temp.folder}"/>
		<antcall target="build.jars"/>
		<antcall target="gather.bin.parts">
			<param name="destination.temp.folder" 
value="${temp.folder}/"/>
		</antcall>
		<zip zipfile="${plugin.destination}/${full.name}.jar" 
basedir="${temp.folder}/${full.name}" filesonly="false" update="no"/>
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}"/>
	</target>

	<target name="gather.bin.parts" depends="init" 
if="destination.temp.folder">
		<mkdir dir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}"/>
		<copy file="${build.result.folder}/javacccore.jar" 
todir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}"/>
		<copy todir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}">
			<fileset dir="${basedir}" 
includes="javacccore.jar,plugin.xml,plugin.properties,../javacc/bin/lib/javacc.j
ar,javacc.jar"/>
		</copy>
	</target>

	<target name="javacccore.jar" depends="init" unless="javacccore.jar" 
description="Create jar: javacccore.jar.">
		<property name="destdir" 
value="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin"/>
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin"/>
		<mkdir dir="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin"/>
		<!-- compile the source code -->
		<javac destdir="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin" 
failonerror="${javacFailOnError}" verbose="${javacVerbose}" 
debug="${javacDebugInfo}" includeAntRuntime="no" 
bootclasspath="${bootclasspath}"
	
	classpath="javacc.jar;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.core.
boot_2.1.2/bin;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.core.boot_2.1.2/boot
.jar;javacccore;javacc;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.core.runtime
_2.1.1/bin;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.core.runtime_2.1.1/runti
me.jar;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins/org.apache.xerces_4.0.13/bin;D:/Eclipse/
2.1.2/eclipse/plugins/org.apache.xerces_4.0.13/xmlParserAPIs.jar;D:/Eclipse/2.1.
2/eclipse/plugins/org.apache.xerces_4.0.13/xercesImpl.jar;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclip
se/plugins/org.eclipse.core.resources_2.1.1/bin;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins
/org.eclipse.core.resources_2.1.1/resources.jar;D:/Eclipse/2.1.2/eclipse/plugins
/org.eclipse.core.resources.win32_2.1.0/resources.jar">
			<src path="src/"/>
		</javac>
		<!-- copy necessary resources -->
		<copy todir="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin">
			<fileset dir="src/" excludes="**/*.java"/>
		</copy>
		<mkdir dir="${build.result.folder}"/>
		<jar jarfile="${build.result.folder}/javacccore.jar" 
basedir="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin"/>
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin"/>
	</target>

	<target name="javacccoresrc.zip" depends="init" unless="javacccore.jar">
		<mkdir dir="${build.result.folder}"/>
		<zip zipfile="${build.result.folder}/javacccoresrc.zip" 
filesonly="false" update="no">
			<fileset dir="src/" includes="**/*.java"/>
		</zip>
	</target>

	<target name="build.jars" depends="init" description="Build all the 
jars for the plug-in: com.pac.jdt.javacc.core.">
		<available property="javacccore.jar" 
file="${build.result.folder}/javacccore.jar"/>
		<antcall target="javacccore.jar"/>
	</target>

	<target name="build.sources" depends="init">
		<available property="javacccoresrc.zip" 
file="${build.result.folder}/javacccoresrc.zip"/>
		<antcall target="javacccoresrc.zip"/>
	</target>

		<target name="build.zips" depends="init">
		</target>

	<target name="gather.sources" depends="init" 
if="destination.temp.folder">
		<mkdir dir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}"/>
		<copy file="${build.result.folder}/javacccoresrc.zip" 
todir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}"/>
		<copy todir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}">
			<fileset dir="${basedir}" 
includes="build.properties,build.xml,plugin.xml,plugin.properties,.classpath,.op
tions,.project,README,bin/,javacccore.jar,com.pac.jdt.javacc.core_1.1.0.jar,src/
"/>
		</copy>
	</target>

	<target name="gather.logs" depends="init" if="destination.temp.folder">
		<mkdir dir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}"/>
		<copy file="${temp.folder}/javacccore.jar.bin.log" 
todir="${destination.temp.folder}/${full.name}"/>
	</target>

	<target name="clean" depends="init" description="Clean the plug-in: 
com.pac.jdt.javacc.core of all the zips, jars and logs created.">
		<delete file="${build.result.folder}/javacccore.jar"/>
		<delete file="${build.result.folder}/javacccoresrc.zip"/>
		<delete file="${plugin.destination}/${full.name}.jar"/>
		<delete file="${plugin.destination}/${full.name}.zip"/>
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}"/>
	</target>

	<target name="refresh" depends="init" if="eclipse.running">
		<eclipse.convertPath 
fileSystemPath="F:\Java\com.pac.jdt.javacc.core\" property="resourcePath"/>
		<eclipse.refreshLocal resource="${resourcePath}" 
depth="infinite"/>
	</target>

	<target name="zip.plugin" depends="init" description="Create a zip 
containing all the elements for the plug-in: com.pac.jdt.javacc.core.">
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}"/>
		<mkdir dir="${temp.folder}"/>
		<antcall target="build.jars"/>
		<antcall target="build.sources"/>
		<antcall target="gather.bin.parts">
			<param name="destination.temp.folder" 
value="${temp.folder}/"/>
		</antcall>
		<antcall target="gather.sources">
			<param name="destination.temp.folder" 
value="${temp.folder}/"/>
		</antcall>
		<delete>
			<fileset dir="${temp.folder}" includes="**/*.bin.log"/>
		</delete>
		<antcall target="zip.folder"/>
		<delete dir="${temp.folder}"/>
	</target>
	<target name="zip.folder" depends="init">
		<zip zipfile="${plugin.destination}/${full.name}.zip" 
basedir="${temp.folder}" filesonly="true" update="no" excludes="**/*.bin.log"/>
	</target>

</project>


Regards

Hi PDE Team

Sorry for this bug...I forget to set up the package prefixes for the external 
jar...

Regards

FA
